title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 18 §§ 358-2.17 - Public assistance
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 18 §§ 358-2.17 - Public assistance

State Regulations

Public assistance includes family assistance and safety
net assistance, emergency assistance to aged, blind or disabled persons, emergency assistance to needy families including special grants and benefits
available pursuant to Part 352 of this Title and, for the purposes of this

Part, refugee cash assistance issued in accordance with Part 373 of this

Title. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 18
§§
358-2.17

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
